  • Uses of ClientCardState in it.polimi.ingsw.model.client.card

    Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.model.client.card that implement ClientCardState
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ClientAwaitConfirmCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying the list of players the model is awaiting a response from.
    class 
    ClientBaseCardState
    Base client side card state, contains info about the card id it represents, and the card class name.
    class 
    ClientCargoPenaltyCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a cargo penalty applied to a specified player.
    class 
    ClientCargoRewardCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a cargo reward applied to a specified player.
    class 
    ClientCombatZoneIndexCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying the index and section info of a combat zone card.
    class 
    ClientCreditsRewardCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a credit reward applied to a specified player.
    class 
    ClientCrewPenaltyCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a crew penalty applied to a specified player.
    class 
    ClientEnemyCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying an enemy info, power, and penalty in case of loss against it.
    class 
    ClientLandingCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying possible landing locations and their rewards.
    class 
    ClientMeteoriteCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying an incoming meteorite, its direction and size.
    class 
    ClientNewCenterCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying the list of players the model is awaiting the selection of a ship part from.
    class 
    ClientProjectileCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying an incoming shot, its direction and size.
